import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import Menus from './Menus' import "./index.css" function Gallery() { const [items, setItems] = useState(Menus); const filterItem =(categItem)=>{ const updates = Menus.filter((currItem) =>{ return currItem.category === categItem; }) setItems(updates) } return ( <>

order your favourite dish

{/*=================== main section is start============== */}
{ items.map((ele) => { const { id, name, image, description, price, category } = ele; return (

{name}

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipi sicing elit. Possimus voluptates.

Price : {price}

{description}

) }) }
) } export default Gallery
